long_description: Tectron gear water repellent spray creates a water-repellent barrier on natural and synthetic fabrics. Great for use on backpacks, tents and apparel. Formulated to give maximum water, soil and grease repellency to clothing, leather and gear; fluorpolymer treatment contains no damaging CFC's. Restores Durable Water Repellent (DWR) finish on waterproof, breathable coated and laminate fabrics. Contains sunscreen to reduce fading and UV degradation caused by the sun. One 11-oz. can treats up to 50 sq. ft. of lightweight fabric. Use on clothes, tents, tarps, sleeping bags, backpacks, shoes, boots, maps and more.
short_description: Tectron gear water repellent spray creates a water-repellent barrier on natural and synthetic fabrics. Great for use on backpacks, tents and apparel.
